value.title: DAX Fridays! #183: How to deal with multiple dates in Power BI
value.excerpt: So you have order date, shipped date, required date....and only one calendar. How do you manage that in power bi and DAX? value.excerpt: Have you ever got this error message?: A table of multiple values was supplied where a single value was expected ? value.title: DAX Fridays! #30: SEARCH vs FIND
